title: Name variables
text: Let n $$=$$ the amount of packages sold and m $$=$$ the salary.

title: Equations
text: We know the first company pays $14000 + $100 for every cable package sold, and the second company pays $20000 + $25 for each package sold. Using this, we can create two equations. One is $$m=14000+100n$$, and the other $$m=20000+25n$$.

title: Solve
text: Now, solve for n or m, and plug it into the equation to find the other variable.
